nodes.text: Unidentified B1 battle droid  (Munificent-class star frigate)

A B1-Series battle droid was stationed on the bridge of Count Dooku's Munificent-class star frigate around 21 BBY. After the Separatist warship Malevolence was defeated by the Galactic Republic forces and General Grievous ended a transmission with Count Dooku regarding the ship's fate, this battle droid informed Dooku that Grievous had ended the transmission himself.
